articles.author: Zaid Jilani
articles.title: DoorDash deal reveals America’s grim debt culture - UnHerd
articles.description: DoorDash, the popular gig economy food delivery service, has announced that it will be partnering with Klarna, the financing service, to offer consumers the option to buy delivery and then pay for it later. That’s right, you can now finance a pizza. Buying no…
articles.content:
””Americans are increasingly living in a society that not only expects them to go deep into debt but encourages them to be trapped in their own personal debtors jail.””
 OK, truth there, so you admi… [+3288 chars]
